name: Jump! (Bloxy!)
description:
Please wait for the game to load. Note that there are still bugs throughout the platformer...

Jump is a fun platformer that is still IN DEVELOPMENT! Jump through each level and get the most points. Much more features will be added soon!

NOTICE: Lighting on the web version is poor

What might come to the game soon:

  • Velocity physics with how much you can move and drag
  • Climb feature on some levels
  • Fix orange walls
  • Some platforms spin on their yaw
  • Explosions push you away
  • Less air friction when you are in the air
  • Double jump
  • More levels and level unlock
  • Redesign
  • Maybe a pause menu
  • More emphasis on stunts
  • Difficulty UI
  • Epic ending for each level
  • Fix the music (like the levels music loop) and add more sound effects (like run sound and fixing the checkpoint sound)
  • Platform UV2 (textures are in local space)
